title: Still have problems patching
body: So today I woke up and decided to try patching again. It still doesn't work for some reason. Overnight for like 8 hours it went from 33% to only 56 and it froze. It takes like 30 minutes for it to go up 1%.

replies.body:
It sounds like there may be a poor connection to the patching servers. Most of the time there are network settings that can be optimized to ensure your connection to League is solid. I recommend working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as a first step in troubleshooting this.

Let me know if that guide resolved this issue.
